name: Disqus.com Dark
description:
This will make Disqus chat dark for webpages with dark themes. 
Normally used in conjunction with other dark themes such as "OMGubuntu Dark" as seen in the screenshot.

NOTICE: This theme is designed for dark webpages! It will not fit in with white webpages or non dark theme sites!
